text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Racing's finest are here at the 3,000-meter G2 Hanshin Daishoten 
turf.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Everyone's excited for the face-off between Racers of the Year Narita 
Brian and Mayano Top Gun!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The extraordinary crowd at the Hanshin Racecourse is waiting with 
bated breath to see the amazing finish to come!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Something about this feels different than Brian's other races.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Until now we've only been bystanders overwhelmed by Brian's 
achievements.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But now… things are different, right?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Race with all your spirit, Brian. And we'll root for you with all of ours.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I will. Thanks for the encouragement.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: We'd better get to the stands then! I saved us one heck of a spot!
All right, you should head for the dock. Come on, I'll walk you over.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Okay… Wish me luck.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: You've got this, Brian!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: We wish you all the best.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Ah! Here she is!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You look like you're ready. Your desire to run is written all over your 
face.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I'm itching to test the results of my training with you two.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I don't need to say how skilled Mayano Top Gun is, but your real 
opponent today will be yourself.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: A one-on-one match against yourself—you'd better win!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Just watch me.

You've amazed me on countless occasions. Fantastic times, surprising 
finishes, victories on the biggest stages…

You've amazed me on countless occasions. Fantastic times, surprising 
finishes, victories on the biggest stages…

And I know you're going to continue to amaze me. Nothing's ever 
dampened your drive to win since I met you.
choice_data_list:
And I know you're going to continue to amaze 
me. Nothing's ever dampened your drive to win 
since I met you.

text_block_list.name: Trainer
text_block_list.text: So go for it, Brian!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
So many people are here! They must be excited to see this 
Racer-of-the-Year showdown!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: And I'm right there with them! I can't wait to race you!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I see…

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
If I'm not mistaken, you can't pull off the dash you used to do before 
your injury.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
But your passion for racing is still there! Your feelings haven't 
changed at all!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: So I've got to race at full throttle too!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hm… It wouldn't be right to say I haven't changed at all.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I used to run like winning was inevitable. But after losing my dash, 
winning started to feel impossible.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Yet the farther away victory seemed, the hungrier I got. Every time it 
slipped through my fingers, it's like I was roused from a sleep.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I've never been hungrier to run than I am now!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Great! But I won't lose, Brian!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Good, I'm counting on it!

text_block_list.name: ナリタブライアン
text_block_list.text: ああ、臨むところだ……！
